DOC.brief_summary: Prospective research to study the relationship between concentrations of metals/metalloids in blood, hair and lung tissue with the occurence of lung cancer or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease.
DOC.brief_title: Blood, Hair and Lung Concentrations of Metals and Metalloids in Patients With Lung Cancer or Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients of 18 to 75 years of age. Patients admitted for lung resection (either cancerous or noncancerous) or lung transplant Patients with mental or physical conditions that prevent them giving their agreement for the study
